senses.sense_definition: Совершать злое дело или причинять вред кому-либо в ответ на нанесённую ранее обиду или зло.

examples.text: Он поклялся <w>мстить</w> убийце своего брата до конца жизни.

target_lang_translations.en: He swore to <w>take revenge</w> on his brother's killer for the rest of his life.

examples.text: Не нужно <w>мстить</w> людям за мелкие ошибки, лучше научиться прощать.

target_lang_translations.en: There is no need to <w>take revenge</w> on people for small mistakes; it is better to learn to forgive.

target_lang_definitions.en: To commit an evil deed or cause harm to someone in response to a previously inflicted insult or wrong.

en.target_lang_sense_clarification: the most common general phrase; implies inflicting harm in return for a wrong
often implies seeking justice or retribution for a serious wrong, such as a crime or death
to fight back or respond in kind to an injury or affront
